DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate repeat use SYSTANE® BALANCE stabilize tear film dry eye patient unstable tear film .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation SYSTANE® BALANCE Dry Eye Subjects With Lipid Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Noncontact lens wearer ; Symptomatology define Ocular Surface Disease Index ( OSDI ) questionnaire ; Lipid deficiency ; Best visual acuity 6/9 good eye ; Willingness adhere instruction set clinical protocol ; Signature subject inform consent form ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Use systemic medication might produce dry eye side effect ; Systemic disease might produce dry eye side effect ; Active recent ocular inflammation infection ; Use ocular medication ; Significant ocular anomaly ; Previous ocular surgery ; Previous use Restasis ; Any medical condition might prejudicial study ; Pregnant lactating ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
